name: La Podrida 2
description:
One year ago, we released the trailer for La Podrida. It was really well received. Throughout the rest of the year, people asked themselves, "If La Podrida is so good, why don't they make La Podrida 2?".



SO THAT'S WHAT WE DID.

La Podrida 2 is a card game inspired by the original, a mix of Truco and La Podrida. Golden cards are placed in the middle to alter the cards' values. If you pay close attention to the cards you get, you might be greeted with a bit of deja vu.

Your opponent?
Electro20

Happy April Fools everyone!

Developed for my friends and the April Fools' Day Jam!
